purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 厂)
Pictophonetic: 敞 indicates the sound; 广 (building) conveys the meaning.

廠商 [ chǎng shāng ]: manufacturer; producer
廠房 [ chǎng fáng ]: a building used as a factory; factory (building); Classifiers: 座

    • 广 [ guǎng ] broad, vast, wide; building, house
    • 敞 [ chǎng ] wide, open, spacious
heisig_chinese_memo: A factory is like a spacious cave with really high ceilings.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A modern factory is a pretty boring place with nothing in it except machines.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " Guang " to " Open " sound, it means shed. The Northern Wei Dynasty Jia Sixie's Qi Min Yaoshu·Raising Sheep: "Building the north wall as a factory."

" Factory " can mean a warehouse or shop where there is vacant space to store goods. "Ming Dynasty-Official Records No. 1": "Where materials are stored, they are called Shenmuchang and Damuchang to store wood.

" Factory " can also mean a workshop. The Sixth History of Ming Dynasty: Food and Goods Records: "Later, Raozhou Tongju was added to manage the firing of the imperial ware factory. The construction is complicated at times, and there are brick factories in Beijing and Suzhou."

The tax collection agencies established in various places in the Ming Dynasty were also called " factories ." "History of Ming Dynasty-Food and Goods Five": "When you travel tens of miles on land and water, you will build a factory with a tree flag. The merchants and cowards are treated as if they want to get rid of them."

" Factory " also refers to a special agency in the Ming Dynasty. "History of Ming Dynasty-Food and Goods Five": "When you travel tens of miles on land and water, you will build a factory with a tree flag. The merchants and cowards are treated as if they want to get rid of them."
humanum_short_description_en: The sound from " Guang " to " Open " indicates a shed.
humanum_full_description:
從「广」，「敞」聲，表示棚舍。北魏賈思勰《齊民要術‧養羊》：「架北牆為廠。」

　　「廠」可表示有空地可存放貨物的棧房、店鋪。《明史‧職官志一》：「凡物料儲偫，曰神木廠，曰大木廠，以蓄木料。」

　　「廠」也可表示工場。《明史‧食貨志六》：「後添設饒州通判，專管御器廠燒造。是時營建是繁，近京及蘇州皆有磚廠。」

　　明代在各地設立的徵稅機構也稱為「廠」。《明史‧食貨志五》：「水陸行數十里，即樹旗建廠，視商賈懦者肆為攘奪，沒其全貲。」

　　「廠」還表示明代的一種特務機構。《明史‧食貨志五》：「水陸行數十里，即樹旗建廠，視商賈懦者肆為攘奪，沒其全貲。」

①沒有牆壁的簡易房屋。［合］廠屋(棚舍；無隔牆的房屋)。
②馬屋；牲口棚子。
③工廠。［合］紗廠；鋼廠；麪粉廠；紡織廠；造紙廠；木器廠。
④明代的一種特務機構。［合］廠臣(明東廠、西廠的主官)；廠獄(指明代東廠、西廠囚禁犯人的牢獄)。

廠字的基本解释

廠
chǎng
见“厂1”。

廠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chǎng］
［《廣韻》昌兩切，上養，昌。］
［《廣韻》尺亮切，去漾，昌。］
亦作“厰1”。“厂3”的繁体字。
(1)犹棚舍。
(2)有空地可存放货物的栈房、店铺。
(3)明代在各地设立的征税机构。
(4)工场。
(5)明代的一种特务机构。
(6)工厂。
(7)同“敞”。宽绰。
(8)同“敞”。张开。

廠字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【广字部】　廠； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页350第30
【廣韻】【正韻】昌兩切【集韻】【韻會】齒兩切，?音敞。【廣韻】露舍也。【集韻】屋無壁也。　又【廣韻】【正韻】?尺亮切。音唱。義同。

廠字的源字形

字形对比：

廠字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chǎng］
["Guang Yun" prosperous in two cuts, upper raising, prosperous. ]
["Guangyun" ruler is bright and cut, go to Yang, Chang. ]
Also known as "Factory 1". Traditional characters for "厂3".
(1) Still sheds.
(2) Warehouses and shops with vacant space for storing goods.
(3) The tax collection agencies established in various places in the Ming Dynasty.
(4) Workshop.
(5) A spy agency in the Ming Dynasty.
(6) Factory.
(7) Same as "open". Generous.
(8) Same as "open". Open.
